summary: Integration Hub Testing Complete. All features working correctly. 11/11 backend tests passed, all frontend UI tests passed. Multi-integration switching (Odoo, Salesforce, HubSpot, MS365) works. All tabs (Connection, Field Mapping, Sync Data, Data Lake, History) functional. Three-zone Data Lake architecture visualization working.

features_verified: ✓ Integration tab switching works (Odoo, Salesforce, HubSpot, MS365)
✓ Odoo tab shows correct fields (URL, Database, Username, API Key)
✓ Salesforce tab shows correct fields (Instance URL, Access Token, API Version)
✓ HubSpot tab shows correct fields (API Key, Portal ID)
✓ MS365 tab shows correct fields (Tenant ID, Client ID, Client Secret)
✓ Connection tab displays connection status (Connected/Not Connected)
✓ Test Connection button functional - shows loading state and result
✓ Field Mapping tab shows entity list (Contacts, Opportunities, Activities)
✓ Field Mapper shows visual field mappings with KEY/REQ badges
✓ Sync Data tab shows Full Synchronization section with Sync All button
✓ Sync Data tab shows entity cards with Preview and Sync Now buttons
✓ Data Lake tab shows three-zone architecture visualization
✓ Data Lake shows Raw Zone, Canonical Zone, Serving Zone with record counts
✓ Data Lake shows collections, entities, and aggregates for each zone
✓ History tab shows Sync History with timestamps and record counts
✓ Refresh Stats button works on Data Lake tab
✓ Help cards show instructions for getting API credentials

critical_code_review_comments: Minor ESLint warnings in IntegrationHub.js: useEffect missing dependencies (getDefaultFormData, fetchLogs) - not critical but should be addressed
updated_files: /app/tests/test_integration_hub.py - Created comprehensive test suite for Integration Hub APIs
seed_data_creation: None - used existing Odoo integration data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Integration Hub is fully functional. Multi-integration support (Odoo, Salesforce, HubSpot, MS365) working with tab switching. All 5 sub-tabs (Connection, Field Mapping, Sync Data, Data Lake, History) working. Odoo is connected to securadotest.odoo.com. Data Lake three-zone architecture (Raw, Canonical, Serving) visualization working. Backend APIs /api/sync/status, /api/data-lake/stats, /api/data-lake/health all returning correct data.
